title: The Secret hunger
creator_credit: Gene Lawrence, Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Illustrates the struggle of people against want and hunger as the pattern of life is traced from birth and childhood in Latin America, through marriage in Africa, adulthood in Asia and Indonesia. Problems impeding greater agricultural productivity are shown.
